name: Timoun
description:
Timoun was made in around 9 Months by 8 students from Rubika Supinfogame:  Benoit Vidot, Rodrigue Maurouard, Lucas Princé, Béatrice Beauval, Arielle Grosjean, Pierre Milon, Alex Caron and Ryan Hervé. 

 We've also had the help of a few external people for the Music, Sound and some small assets. please check the credits for details.
